Class RegularZombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimulationObject
      • Zombie
        • RegularZombie

  • public class RegularZombie
extends Zombie
    RegularZombie class inherits from abstract zombie class for code reusing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularZombie(java.lang.String name, Position position)
      Constructor Initialize the regular zombie with 0 step count Initiates abstract zombie class with the following parameters: ZombieType: Regular CollisionRange: 2.0 DetectionRange: 20.0 Speed: 5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides following zombie step in the abstract zombie class Move to the next position and if the step count of this zombie is 4, change state to wandering
      void wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides wandering zombie step in the abstract zombie class Go to the next position, Try to find closest soldier and change state to following, If no closest soldier, do nothing

      • Methods inherited from class Zombie

        distanceToClosestSoldier, getCollisionRange, getDetectionRange, getZombieState, getZombieType, setCollisionRange, setDetectionRange, setZombieState, setZombieType, step, toString

      • Methods inherited from class SimulationObject

        getDirection, getName, getPosition, getSpeed, isActive, nextPosition, setActive, setDirection, setPosition

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • RegularZombie

        public RegularZombie(java.lang.String name,
                     Position position)

        position - zombie's position

    • Method Detail

      • wanderingZombieStep

        public void wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
        Overrides wandering zombie step in the abstract zombie class Go to the next position, Try to find closest soldier and change state to following, If no closest soldier, do nothing
        Specified by:
        wanderingZombieStep in class Zombie
        Parameters:
        controller - simulation controller

      • followingZombieStep

        public void followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
        Overrides following zombie step in the abstract zombie class Move to the next position and if the step count of this zombie is 4, change state to wandering
        Specified by:
        followingZombieStep in class Zombie
        Parameters:
        controller - simulation controller
